name: Summer Roguelike Project - Week 6
description:
This is my entry for week 6 of Reddit's Summer Roguelike Tutorial.

Each week, I'll be using Construct 3 to complete the required steps and posting the results here. By the end, I should have a fully-fledged roguelike!

You can follow my progress here on Twitter!

This project is open source! You can download a copy of the Construct 3 file here. (Warning: the code is hot linguine ). You will need to have these three addons installed in order to view/edit the project.

This week, I focused on: 

  • Adding & tweaking level-up items.
  • Adding more monsters.
  • Tweaking the difficulty curve of the dungeon.
  • Laying the groundwork for equipment pick-ups.
    • These do not spawn in the dungeon at the moment.

If you have any feedback, feel free to leave it below! See you next week!
